@graph.name: How to Add Products to Shopify
@graph.description: Complete guide for adding products to your Shopify store from start to finish

step.name: Access Shopify Admin
step.text: Log in to your Shopify admin dashboard and click on the 'Products' tab from the sidebar menu.

step.name: Click Add Product
step.text: In the Products page, click the 'Add Product' button to start adding a new product.

step.name: Enter Product Title
step.text: Provide a clear and descriptive product title that includes relevant keywords.

step.name: Write Product Description
step.text: Write a detailed and SEO-optimized product description that highlights product features and benefits.

step.name: Add Product Images
step.text: Upload high-quality product images from multiple angles using a mobile device's camera or professional photography.

step.name: Set Pricing
step.text: Input the original price and any discounted price for promotions.

step.name: Manage Inventory
step.text: Enable Track Quantity to automatically update stock levels. Add SKU and barcode numbers for tracking.

step.name: Configure Shipping
step.text: Enter the product's shipping weight and dimensions for accurate shipping rate calculation.

step.name: Add Product Variants
step.text: Define different variants like size or color under the 'Variants' section.

step.name: Preview Product
step.text: Use the 'Preview' button to check how the product will appear on your store and ensure all details are correct.

step.name: Set Product Availability
step.text: Select the sales channels where your product will be available (e.g., online store, POS).

step.name: Publish Product
step.text: Once satisfied, click 'Publish' to make your product live across your selected sales channels.

mainEntity.name: How do I add multiple products to Shopify at once?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can use a CSV file to add multiple products to Shopify simultaneously. Navigate to the Products page in your Shopify admin, click on 'Import,' and upload your CSV file with product details like titles, descriptions, prices, and SKUs. Shopify will process the file and add the products in bulk.

mainEntity.name: Can I sell both physical and digital products on Shopify?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Shopify allows you to sell both physical products and digital products. For physical products, you'll need to configure shipping settings. For digital products, disable the shipping option, and the customer will receive the digital file after purchase.

mainEntity.name: What is a product variant, and how do I add it?

acceptedAnswer.text: A product variant refers to different versions of a product, such as various sizes, colors, or materials. To add variants, go to the 'Variants' section when editing a product in Shopify. Click 'Add Variant' and input the different option values (e.g., size, color). Each variant can have its own price, SKU, and inventory count.

mainEntity.name: What is the URL structure of a product in Shopify?

acceptedAnswer.text: Products have a default URL structure of /product/product-name.
